alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:24AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Logan and central Scott Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 624 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Mulberry to near Bloomer to near Greenwood. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Mansfield... Magazine... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Cardiff... Oliver... Echo... Caulksville... Barber... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Chismville... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
